## METHODS

### withSourceHandlers( Tech ) `STATIC`
> A functional mixin for techs that want to use the Source Handler pattern.
> 
> ##### EXAMPLE:
> 
>   videojs.MediaTechController.withSourceHandlers.call(MyTech);
